about_the_game:
Welcome to Record Shop Simulator, the ultimate simulation game where your love for music and dreams of running a record store become reality! In this immersive world, you're not just a store owner; you're the heart of a thriving community where every album cover has a story, and every sale makes a difference.

Create and Customize Your Own Record Store

Start from the ground up and design your dream record store. From cozy corners filled with music gear to sleek stands showcasing your precious vinyl collection, the choice is yours. With a wide range of furniture and decorations, personalize every inch of your space to attract music lovers from all walks of life. And it’s not just records—stock up on headphones, shirts, record players, speakers, and even quirky decorations! Plus, you can expand your store, paint the walls, and replace the flooring.

Collect 90+ Unique Records

Purchase the record label rights to sell in your store. With over 90 different records spanning various genres and eras, your inventory will never look dull. Display, play, and sell these records to customers with a keen ear for music. Each record comes with its own backstory, adding layers of discovery and nostalgia. It's like being a musical archaeologist without the dust and sunburn.

Manage Your Store with Care

Running a record store is no small feat. From cleaning up messes to restocking shelves, your managerial skills will be put to the test. Engage with your customers, understand their tastes, and make smart decisions.

Protect Your Dream

Not everyone plays by the rules. Keep an eye out for shoplifters attempting to snatch your valuable vinyl. Implement security measures, confront sneaky thieves, and protect your store's reputation and inventory.

Dynamic Challenges and Endless Playability

With dynamic customer preferences, random events, and a vibrant mall, no two days at your record store are the same. Experience the thrill of managing a growing business and becoming a staple in the music community. Just remember: every day is a new opportunity to rock your store to the next level.

Why Play RSS?


Dive into a richly detailed world filled with music and nostalgia.
Enjoy endless customization options for your store and inventory.
Discover and collect 90+ unique records with their own stories plus tons of other products to sell.
Tackle the challenges of running a store, from logistics to security.
Engage in a dynamic gameplay experience with endless replayability.
Your record store dream awaits. Can you build the ultimate record shop? Let’s find out—one vinyl at a time!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Customize everything from decor to inventory, manage your store with care, fend off shoplifters, and tackle dynamic challenges. Can you build the ultimate music haven? Find out now!
